member.name: T:Skyline.DataMiner.Analytics.Arrows.SetAnalyticsStateIconSubscriptionMessage
member.summary:
Request to manage subscriptions in order to register to get Analytics Icon updates.
Note: SLAnalytics always expects a vector string[] of keys, so not just a string Instance. 1) If the dmaid,eid or pid are negative, then only the instance "" is used. So for example, if we receive (1,-1,-1,{"hello"}), then we interpret it as (1,-1,-1,{""}) (or equivalently (1,-1,-1,{}) and we will send arrows for dmaid==1, and all parameters with instance "" of all elements. 2) Else, if dmaid, eid and pid are all positive, then we send arrows for all the parameters having those dmaid,eid and pid and having an instance mentioned in the Instances vector. If the Instances vector however is empty, then all instances are allowed. So, if we get e.g. (1,1,1,{}), we will send arrows for all instances of the parameter 1/1/1. If we get (1,1,1,{"Hello"}), we only send an arrow for 1/1/1/"Hello".
Todo: SLNet sends a setanalyticsstateiconsubscriptionmessage for parameterid 127 when I open the microsoft element. This parameter is a string...
